poem:
Where Was the Green Debate?

Beneath the hum of lights and cameras' glare,
promises floated on the smog of airwaves,
yet only clouds heard whispers of a future—
a green tide, rising somewhere beyond screens.
Absent leaders spoke in empty chairs,
leaving silence to sow seeds of despair.
